name: DoctorLocator
0:
”Alexa, ask doctor locator search by location”
”Alexa, ask doctor locator search by insurance”
”Alexa, ask doctor locator search by specialty”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: doctor locator
des:
Welcome to the Doctor Locator Alexa Skill. Use this skill to find a medical provider by location, specialty or insurance sorted by the distance. For a complete list of insurance companies and specialties you can search by, just ask Doctor Locator, list insurance companies or list specialties.

Simply follow the instructions below to begin.

Note: Remember to speak clearly.
User case 1:
- User says "Ask Doctor Locator"
- Alexa gives intro and instructions
- User then asks "Search by location", or "Search by insurance", or "Search by specialty", or "List insurance companies", or "List specialties".
- Note: Continue following instructions from Alexa.

User case 2:
- User says "Ask Doctor Locator to find a cardiologist in Brooklyn, New York"
- Alexa asks "Would you like to search by insurance"
- User then says "No"
- Alexa provides a list of Cardiologist in Brooklyn, NY that are in the database.

Insurance examples are: Aetna, Amerihealth, HIP, Empire, to name a few. You can always say 'Alexa ask Doctor Locator list insurance companies' for a list of insurance companies to choose from.

Specialty examples are: Cardiologist, Gynecologist, to name a few. You can always say 'Alexa ask Doctor Locator list specialties' for a list of specialties to choose from.

Please note: This is not intended for medical emergencies. We are adding providers and insurance companies to Doctor Locator on a regular basis. 

The Doctor Locator Alexa App will continue to grow and develop with more and improved features over time. We appreciate your support and thank you for joining us on our journey to make a positive difference in healthcare, with technology.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
